Debrief.Wrappers

Class CompositeTrackWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.PlainWrapper
      • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.LightweightTrackWrapper
        • Debrief.Wrappers.TrackWrapper
          • Debrief.Wrappers.CompositeTrackWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISecondaryTrack, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, ColoredWatchable, WatchableList, CanEnumerate, DynamicPlottable, Editable, Exportable, GriddableSeriesMarker, HasEditables, HasEditables.ProvidesContiguousElements, Layer, Layers.NeedsToKnowAboutLayers, Plottable, Renamable, DraggableItem, HasDraggableComponents, SupportsPropertyListeners, RightClickCutCopyAdaptor.IsTransientForChildren

    public class CompositeTrackWrapper
extends TrackWrapper
implements GriddableSeriesMarker, Layers.NeedsToKnowAboutLayers
    class that represents a series of track legs, but a single start time/location
    Author:
    ian
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
